title: Ekta Kaul quits popular TV show Mere Angne Mein. And this is the reason | tv | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Ekta Kaul quits popular TV show Mere Angne Mein. And this is the reason 
Actor Ekta Kaul has quit her hit show Mere Angne Mein. The actor confirmed the news, saying she was leaving the show “owing to good personal reasons”. tv Updated: Feb 17, 2017 20:58 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Ekta played the role of Riya Mathur on the Star Plus show.(YoUTube) 
Bad news for Ekta Kaul fans: The popular TV actor has quit her hit show Mere Angne Mein. She rose to popularity with Rab Se Sohna Ishq on Zee TV. 
Ekta played the role of Riya Mathur on the Star Plus show. Reports say that she is now serving her notice period. A post shared by Ekta Kaul (@ektakaul11) on Jan 22, 2017 at 8:38am PST 
“Ekta has already put in her papers and she will wind up her shoot in the last week of February,” Tellychakkar.com reported. 
The actor also confirmed the news when the online portal contacted her. “Yes, I am quitting the show owing to good personal reasons,” she said. A post shared by Ekta Kaul (@ektakaul11) on Jan 8, 2017 at 12:21am PST 
Makers will reportedly kill Ekta’s character when she will deliver a baby on the show. 
Interestingly, Ekta wanted to quit the show in January, but makers extended her tenure. It was even reported that the actor was planning to marry as hinted by one of her Instagram posts. The actor later stated that it was a prank played by her and her onscreen sister-in-law, Charu Asopa. Read more
